title: Videos about typography
content:
Hello All!

I’m interested in videos (special the ones availables online) about typography.  
I already know the typophile video area...  
I’m special interested in videos that show/fallow the development of a typeface.  
Anyone has/knows?

Best regards  
António Fonseca

 [‹ Reality check before the fog: Web fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122013742/http:/www.typophile.com/node/46896 "Go to previous forum topic") [Offset Printing Process ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122013742/http:/www.typophile.com/node/47913 "Go to next forum topic")
author: afonseca1974

comments.content:
Hi António,

<cite>I already know the typophile video area</cite>  
For those who don’t, here’s a link: [Video](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122013742/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/Video).

Global Type (used to) host a few historic type movies (all of them in German, and not available at the moment, as it seems):

- [History of Type](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122013742/http:/www.global-type.org/Film-Purup.543.0.html)
- [Type Design at Berthold, ca. 1980](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122013742/http:/www.global-type.org/Type-Desig.738.0.html)
- [H. Berthold in the 1930s](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122013742/http:/www.global-type.org/Berthold-i.806.0.html)

Furthermore:

- [Fine Print. An interview with Michael Bierut](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122013742/http:/www.theatlantic.com/movies/fonts/) by The Atlantic
- [Stephen Fry and the Gutenberg Press](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122013742/http:/www.dontpressme.com/video/gutenberg.flv) (has been [discussed here](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122013742/http:/www.typophile.com/node/44217))
- [The Linotype Typesetter, documentary from 1960](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122013742/http:/chaosradio.ccc.de/ctv122.html), hosted by Chaosradio
- [Manual typesetting explained](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122013742/http:/www.dma.ufg.ac.at/assets/13712/intern/bleisatz.mov) by Digital Media for Artists - Kunstuniversität Linz [DE]
- [Recordings of some of the talks held at ATypI 2007 in Brighton](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122013742/http:/www.river-valley.tv/conferences/atypi_brighton2007/) by River Valley
- [Video archive of the TYPO Berlin conference](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122013742/http:/typoberlin.de/video/)

F
There might be some overlap with videos previously mentioned, I’m not sure, but there’s the TypeCulture movies area.
